scripts.build: yarn build:css & rimraf .bos/transpiled && mkdir -p .bos/transpiled/src && mkdir -p .bos/transpiled/common/src && mkdir -p .bos/transpiled/address/src/bos-components/components/Address && mkdir -p .bos/transpiled/blocks/src/bos-components/components/Blocks && mkdir -p .bos/transpiled/ft/src/bos-components/components/FT && mkdir -p .bos/transpiled/nft/src/bos-components/components/NFT && mkdir -p .bos/transpiled/txn/src/bos-components/components/Transactions && sucrase ./src -d .bos/transpiled/src/bos-components --transforms typescript,jsx --jsx-runtime preserve --disable-es-transforms --out-extension jsx && node ./build.js
